restriction_type.label: Store Restriction Type
restriction_type.tooltip:
Non Restricted: The store is accessible without any restrictions.
Restricted (Only Configured Pages Accessible): The store is restricted i.e. requires login to be accessible. However you can allow guest users to access some pages(see 'Allowed Pages' section below).
Accessible (Only Configured Pages/Sections Restricted): The store is accessible without any login. However you can restrict some pages & sections(see 'Restricted Pages/Sections' section below).
restriction_type.comment:
<script type="text/javascript">
                            mpCheckRestrictionType = function() {
                                var checkRestrictionType = $('magepsycho_storerestrictionpro_restricted_settings_restriction_type').value;
                                var restrictedWithExceptionElements = ['row_magepsycho_storerestrictionpro_restricted_settings_restrictionheadingpre','row_magepsycho_storerestrictionpro_restricted_settings_restrictionheading', 'row_magepsycho_storerestrictionpro_restricted_settings_allowedpagesheading'];

                                var allowedWithExceptionElements = ['row_magepsycho_storerestrictionpro_restricted_settings_restrictionheading2pre','row_magepsycho_storerestrictionpro_restricted_settings_restrictionheading2','row_magepsycho_storerestrictionpro_restricted_settings_restricted_section_heading', 'row_magepsycho_storerestrictionpro_restricted_settings_restricted_pages_heading'];
                                if (checkRestrictionType == 2) {
                                    restrictedWithExceptionElements.each(function (item) {
                                        $(item).show();
                                    });
                                    allowedWithExceptionElements.each(function (item) {
                                        $(item).hide();
                                    });
                                } else if (checkRestrictionType == 3) {
                                    restrictedWithExceptionElements.each(function (item) {
                                        $(item).hide();
                                    });
                                    allowedWithExceptionElements.each(function (item) {
                                        $(item).show();
                                    });
                                } else {
                                    restrictedWithExceptionElements.each(function (item) {
                                        $(item).hide();
                                    });
                                    allowedWithExceptionElements.each(function (item) {
                                        $(item).hide();
                                    });
                                }
                            }

                            Event.observe(window, 'load', function() {
                                Event.observe('magepsycho_storerestrictionpro_restricted_settings_restriction_type', 'change', mpCheckRestrictionType);
                                mpCheckRestrictionType();
                            })
                        </script>
